generated_text: "Module 12: Data" (47 minutes, Intermediate). Effective leaders make informed decisions using data. Learn to collect, analyze, and interpret data to drive business outcomes. Understand key metrics, identify trends, and create data-driven strategies to enhance organizational performance.

mcqs.question: What do effective leaders use to make informed decisions?
What is the purpose of collecting and analyzing data in a business setting?

flashcards.back: Strategies that are based on the analysis and interpretation of data to drive business outcomes
Important measurements that are used to evaluate and understand business performance
